item.description:
Let's go tour Moonlight Meadery and taste some sweet wine.

 

A little info about the Meadery: It all started back in 1995, when Michael tried a cyser (apple and honey mead) for the first time.  Since that first sip Michael has developed a passion, and a masterful skill at making international award winning meads. Michael Fairbrother has started Moonlight Meadery®, with a mission to bring ultra premium meads to the market place.  It is more than a product and it is more than a process, it's our obsession.

"Mead to me is passion, it's about living and love, it's about enjoyment, family and friends, and sharing." says Michael Fairbrother, Founder and Mead Maker.

Our meads will be unique, and unlike anything you have ever tried, you will find it incredible!   We are going to embrace the unique nature of natural honey as minimally processed as possible.

Tour & Tasting… $15 per person (To be paid on the day of the tour to the Meadery).

  • Deluxe Tour
  • Large keepsake glass, with taste up to 6 meads.
  • $5 off purchase of 2 or more bottles.

NOTE: Meetup time is 12:45. Tour will begin at 1:00 sharp!

We will only wait 15 minutes for you to arrive at the meeting place, please remember that if you are running late, can’t find us or need to cancel at the last minute, the Meetup phone number is:  978-304-2811. NOTE this phone does not accept text messages.

Remember if you have not paid your dues this year, this event would be a good opportunity to do so.  Thank you for paying your dues.

Remember to change your RSVP to an event if your plans change.  Also don’t forget after attending a meetup event to let your Organizers know if you had a good time by rating the meetup.

Looking forward to seeing you!

Donna
item.how_to_find_us: We will be inside come in and find us.
item.name: Tour & Tasting at Moonlight Meadery
